elevenlabs_prompt_precise.description: Precise version with BPM, key, instruments (150-200 chars)

elevenlabs_prompt_evocative.description: Evocative version focusing on mood and texture (150-200 chars)

elevenlabs_prompt_voiceover.description: Voiceover version: soft background music bed + detailed voice characteristics + narration text (each sentence on its own line) + duration. Ends with 'voiceover only'.
